Package org.activebpel.rt.war.tags

This package contains all the custom tags used for driving the web app ui.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeErrorAwareBean Interface for tags to report errors when setting properties on beans.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractBeanPropertyTag Provides support for reading a property from another bean within the page context.
AeAbstractFormPropertyTag Base class used to set form parameters into a bean
AeAbstractPropertyFormatterTag Base class for date and number formatting tags.
AeAbstractResourceTag An abstract class that implements the resource bundle management.
AeBeanUtils Utility class for common reflection operations used by JSP tags.
AeCheckboxPropertySetterTag Tag that allows ones to set the boolean value of a html form checkbox.
AeCollectionIteratorTag Simple tag to iterate over a collection.
AeDateSetterTag Enables the setting of date properties on a bean from date values passed in as request params.
AeGetPropertyTag Equivalent class of the jsp:getProperty bean but allows one to nest property names.
AeGetResourceTag This tag will retrieve a value from the configured resource bundle.
AeIfFalseTag A simple tag that will only include its body content if the named property on the specified bean evaluates to false.
AeIfParamInListTag A tag that includes its body content only if the given http parameter value is in the given list of strings.
AeIfParamMatchesTag A tag that will include its body content if the value of the named http servlet request parameter matches the expected value.
AeIfParamNotInListTag A tag that includes its body content only if the given http parameter value is not in the given list of strings.
AeIfParamNotMatchesTag A tag that will include its body content if the value of the named http servlet request parameter does not match the expected value.
AeIfPropertyInListTag A tag that includes its body content only if the given property value is in the given list of strings.
AeIfPropertyMatchesTag A tag that includes its body content only if the given value property matches the string value of the specified property for a named bean.
AeIfPropertyNotInListTag A tag that includes its body content only if the given property value is not in the given list of strings.
AeIfPropertyNotMatchesTag A tag that includes its body content only if the given value property does not match the string value of the specified property for a named bean.
AeIfTrueTag A simple tag that will only include its body content if the named property on the specified bean evaluates to true.
AeIfUserInRoleTag Custom tag that will evaluate its contents if the user is in the role specified or if there was no authentication information available.
AeIndexedPropertyTag Tag for "iterating" through the indexed properties of a bean object.
AeIndexedPropertyTEI TagExtraInfo impl for setting indexed property values as scripting objects on the JSP page.
AeIntegerPropertySetterTag Tag that can use to set integer values in a bean.
AeJSStringFormatterTag JSP Tag to convert a Java multi-line string into a JavaScript compatible composite string.
AePropertyDateFormatterTag Formats a Date value to be displayed.
AePropertyNumberFormatterTag Formats a Number value to be displayed.
AeQNamePropertyTag Extracts the local name or the namespace uri from a property that is a qname.
AeRequestEncodingTag Sets the character encoding for the page's request parameters.
AeRequestParamTag Writes out the value of the named request parameter to the JspWriter.
AeSetPropertyTag Property setter that is equivalent to the jsp:setProperty.
AeSetResourceTag Tag to set the resource bundle value on a bean.
AeStringPropertySetterTag Tag that allows ones to set string values, including empty strings..
AeXMLStringFormatterTag This class formats an XML string into one that can be properly rendered for display in a browser.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.war.tags Description

This package contains all the custom tags used for driving the web app ui.
